statements: SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions WHERE destination='Moon';
SELECT mission_name, description FROM SpaceMissions WHERE launch_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions WHERE destination='Moon' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM SpaceMissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mission_name DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM SpaceMissions WHERE destination='Mars' OR description LIKE '%exploration%';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY mission_name ASC, launch_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_status FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status='Successful';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions WHERE launch_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT discovery_id, discovery_name, discovery_date FROM scientific_discoveries ORDER BY discovery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status='success';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM scientific_discoveries WHERE YEAR(discovery_date)=2020;
SELECT discovery_name, discovery_description FROM scientific_discoveries WHERE discovery_description LIKE '%water%';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM space_missions WHERE launch_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_status FROM SpaceMissions WHERE mission_status = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM ScientificDiscoveries WHERE discovery_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT discovery_name, discovery_description FROM ScientificDiscoveries ORDER BY discovery_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions WHERE mission_status = 'Completed';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM SpaceMissions WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ScientificDiscoveries WHERE discovery_date >= '2010-01-01' ORDER BY discovery_date ASC;

SELECT SpaceMissions.mission_name, ScientificDiscoveries.discovery_name FROM SpaceMissions INNER JOIN MissionDiscoveries ON SpaceMissions.mission_id = MissionDiscoveries.mission_id INNER JOIN ScientificDiscoveries ON MissionDiscoveries.discovery_id = ScientificDiscoveries.discovery_id ORDER BY SpaceMissions.mission_name ASC, ScientificDiscoveries.discovery_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, status FROM missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT scientist_name, expertise FROM scientists WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT discovery_name, discovery_date FROM discoveries WHERE discovery_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT research_name, research_date, discoverer FROM research JOIN discoveries ON research.discovery_id = discoveries.discovery_id;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE status='success';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions WHERE destination='Mars';
SELECT mission_name, discovery_name, researcher_id FROM missions JOIN research ON missions.mission_id = research.discovery_id;
SELECT scientist_name, nationality FROM scientists WHERE expertise='Astrophysics';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, status FROM missions WHERE launch_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Mission;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM Mission;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM Mission ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM Mission WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Spacecraft WHERE type = 'Satellite';
SELECT * FROM Mission ORDER BY mission_id DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Mission WHERE destination = 'Mars';
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality FROM Astronaut WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY astronaut_id ASC;
SELECT spacecraft_name, type FROM Spacecraft WHERE mission_id = 3 AND launch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY spacecraft_name;

SELECT scientist_name, nationality, field_of_study FROM Scientist JOIN Discovery ON Scientist.discovery_id = Discovery.discovery_id WHERE Discovery.discovery_location = 'Moon' ORDER BY scientist_id DESC;
